sentences.chinese: 故民不敢犯也。
sentences.literal: Thus people dare not offend.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus people dare not offend.

sentences.chinese: 是故韓子曰「布帛尋常，庸人不釋，鑠金百溢，盜跖不搏」者，非庸人之心重，尋常之利深，而盜跖之欲淺也；
sentences.literal: Thus Han Zi said 'silk cloth eight chi, common person not release, melt gold hundred yi, Dao Zhi not grab' , not common person heart heavy, eight chi profit deep, Dao Zhi desire shallow;
sentences.idiomatic: Thus Han Zi said 'silk cloth eight chi, common person not release, melt gold hundred yi, Dao Zhi not grab' , not common person heart heavy, eight chi profit deep, Dao Zhi desire shallow;

sentences.chinese: 又不以盜跖之行，為輕百鎰之重也。
sentences.literal: Again not consider Dao Zhi conduct as light hundred jin heavy.
sentences.idiomatic: Again not consider Dao Zhi conduct as light hundred jin heavy.

sentences.chinese: 搏必隨手刑，則盜跖不搏百鎰；
sentences.literal: Grab must follow hand punish, then Dao Zhi not grab hundred jin;
sentences.idiomatic: Grab must follow hand punish, then Dao Zhi not grab hundred jin;

sentences.chinese: 而罰不必行也，則庸人不釋尋常。
sentences.literal: Punish not must execute, then common person not release eight chi.
sentences.idiomatic: Punish not must execute, then common person not release eight chi.

sentences.chinese: 是故城高五丈，而樓季不輕犯也；
sentences.literal: Thus city high five zhang, Lou Ji not lightly offend;
sentences.idiomatic: Thus city high five zhang, Lou Ji not lightly offend;

sentences.chinese: 泰山之高百仞，而跛羊牧其上。
sentences.literal: Tai mountain high hundred ren, lame sheep herd above.
sentences.idiomatic: Tai mountain high hundred ren, lame sheep herd above.

sentences.chinese: 夫樓季也而難五丈之限，豈跛羊也而易百仞之高哉？
sentences.literal: Lou Ji moreover difficult five zhang limit, how lame sheep easy hundred ren high?
sentences.idiomatic: Lou Ji moreover difficult five zhang limit, how lame sheep easy hundred ren high?

sentences.chinese: 峭塹之勢異也。
sentences.literal: Steep moat situation different.
sentences.idiomatic: Steep moat situation different.

sentences.chinese: 明主聖王之所以能久處尊位，長執重勢，而獨擅天下之利者，非有異道也，能獨斷而審督責，必深罰，故天下不敢犯也。
sentences.literal: Enlightened lord sage king what can long dwell honored position, long hold heavy power, alone monopolize world profit, not have different way, can alone decide examine supervise responsibility, must deep punish, thus world dare not offend.
sentences.idiomatic: Enlightened lord sage king what can long dwell honored position, long hold heavy power, alone monopolize world profit, not have different way, can alone decide examine supervise responsibility, must deep punish, thus world dare not offend.

sentences.chinese: 今不務所以不犯，而事慈母之所以敗子也，則亦不察於聖人之論矣。
sentences.literal: Now not manage so not offend, yet do benevolent mother what defeat son, then also not examine sage person discussion.
sentences.idiomatic: Now not manage so not offend, yet do benevolent mother what defeat son, then also not examine sage person discussion.

sentences.chinese: 夫不能行聖人之術，則舍為天下役何事哉？
sentences.literal: Cannot execute sage person method, then abandon be world servitude what affair!
sentences.idiomatic: Cannot execute sage person method, then abandon be world servitude what affair!

sentences.chinese: 可不哀邪！
sentences.literal: Can not sorrow!
sentences.idiomatic: Can not sorrow!

sentences.chinese: 且夫儉節仁義之人立於朝，則荒肆之樂輟矣；
sentences.literal: Moreover frugal moderate benevolent righteous person stand in court, then wild unrestrained pleasure stop;
sentences.idiomatic: Moreover frugal moderate benevolent righteous person stand in court, then wild unrestrained pleasure stop;

sentences.chinese: 諫說論理之臣閒於側，則流漫之志詘矣；
sentences.literal: Admonish speak discuss principle ministers at side, then unrestrained will yield;
sentences.idiomatic: Admonish speak discuss principle ministers at side, then unrestrained will yield;

sentences.chinese: 烈士死節之行顯於世，則淫康之虞廢矣。
sentences.literal: Fierce scholars die integrity conduct appear in world, then licentious peaceful worry abandon.
sentences.idiomatic: Fierce scholars die integrity conduct appear in world, then licentious peaceful worry abandon.

sentences.chinese: 故明主能外此三者，而獨操主術以制聽從之臣，而修其明法，故身尊而勢重也。
sentences.literal: Thus enlightened lord can exclude these three, alone grasp lord method to control listen follow ministers, cultivate clear law, thus body honored power heavy.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus enlightened lord can exclude these three, alone grasp lord method to control listen follow ministers, cultivate clear law, thus body honored power heavy.

sentences.chinese: 凡賢主者，必將能拂世磨俗，而廢其所惡，立其所欲，故生則有尊重之勢，死則有賢明之謚也。
sentences.literal: All worthy lord, must will can brush world polish customs, abandon what hate, establish what desire, thus alive have respected power, dead have worthy enlightened posthumous title.
sentences.idiomatic: All worthy lord, must will can brush world polish customs, abandon what hate, establish what desire, thus alive have respected power, dead have worthy enlightened posthumous title.

sentences.chinese: 是以明君獨斷，故權不在臣也。
sentences.literal: Thus enlightened ruler alone decide, thus power not in ministers.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus enlightened ruler alone decide, thus power not in ministers.

sentences.chinese: 然後能滅仁義之涂，掩馳說之口，困烈士之行，塞聰揜明，內獨視聽，故外不可傾以仁義烈士之行，而內不可奪以諫說忿爭之辯。
sentences.literal: Then can extinguish benevolent righteous path, block gallop speak mouth, distress fierce scholars conduct, block hearing cover clear, inner alone see hear, thus outside cannot incline with benevolent righteous fierce scholars conduct, inner cannot seize with admonish speak resent contend eloquence.
sentences.idiomatic: Then can extinguish benevolent righteous path, block gallop speak mouth, distress fierce scholars conduct, block hearing cover clear, inner alone see hear, thus outside cannot incline with benevolent righteous fierce scholars conduct, inner cannot seize with admonish speak resent contend eloquence.

sentences.chinese: 故能犖然獨行恣睢之心而莫之敢逆。
sentences.literal: Thus can brightly alone act indulge wantonly heart not dare oppose.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus can brightly alone act indulge wantonly heart not dare oppose.

sentences.chinese: 若此然後可謂能明申、韓之術，而修商君之法。
sentences.literal: Like this then can call able clear Shen, Han method, cultivate Shang Jun law.
sentences.idiomatic: Like this then can call able clear Shen, Han method, cultivate Shang Jun law.

sentences.chinese: 法修術明而天下亂者，未之聞也。
sentences.literal: Law cultivate method clear yet world chaos, not heard.
sentences.idiomatic: Law cultivate method clear yet world chaos, not heard.

sentences.chinese: 故曰「王道約而易操」也。
sentences.literal: Thus said 'king way concise easy grasp'.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus said 'king way concise easy grasp'.

sentences.chinese: 唯明主為能行之。
sentences.literal: Only enlightened lord can execute.
sentences.idiomatic: Only enlightened lord can execute.

sentences.chinese: 若此則謂督責之誠，則臣無邪，臣無邪則天下安，天下安則主嚴尊，主嚴尊則督責必，督責必則所求得，所求得則國家富，國家富則君樂豐。
sentences.literal: Like this then call supervise responsibility sincerity, then ministers no evil, ministers no evil then world peaceful, world peaceful then lord strict honored, lord strict honored then supervise responsibility certain, supervise responsibility certain then what seek obtain, what seek obtain then state rich, state rich then lord happy abundant.
sentences.idiomatic: Like this then call supervise responsibility sincerity, then ministers no evil, ministers no evil then world peaceful, world peaceful then lord strict honored, lord strict honored then supervise responsibility certain, supervise responsibility certain then what seek obtain, what seek obtain then state rich, state rich then lord happy abundant.

sentences.chinese: 故督責之術設，則所欲無不得矣。
sentences.literal: Thus supervise responsibility method established, then what desire none not obtain.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus supervise responsibility method established, then what desire none not obtain.

sentences.chinese: 群臣百姓救過不給，何變之敢圖？
sentences.literal: Ministers hundred surnames save excess not sufficient, what change dare plot?
sentences.idiomatic: Ministers hundred surnames save excess not sufficient, what change dare plot?

sentences.chinese: 若此則帝道備，而可謂能明君臣之術矣。
sentences.literal: Like this then emperor way complete, can call able clear ruler minister method.
sentences.idiomatic: Like this then emperor way complete, can call able clear ruler minister method.

sentences.chinese: 雖申、韓復生，不能加也。
sentences.literal: Though Shen, Han revive, cannot add.
sentences.idiomatic: Though Shen, Han revive, cannot add.

sentences.chinese: 書奏，二世悅。
sentences.literal: Letter submitted, Second Emperor pleased.
sentences.idiomatic: Letter submitted, Second Emperor pleased.

sentences.chinese: 於是行督責益嚴，稅民深者為明吏。
sentences.literal: Thus execute supervise responsibility increasingly strict, tax people deep called clear official.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus execute supervise responsibility increasingly strict, tax people deep called clear official.

sentences.chinese: 二世曰：「若此則可謂能督責矣。」
sentences.literal: Second Emperor said: 'Like this then can call able supervise responsibility.'
sentences.idiomatic: Second Emperor said: 'Like this then can call able supervise responsibility.'

sentences.chinese: 刑者相半於道，而死人日成積於市。
sentences.literal: Punished mutually half on road, dead people daily piled in market.
sentences.idiomatic: Punished mutually half on road, dead people daily piled in market.

sentences.chinese: 殺人眾者為忠臣。
sentences.literal: Kill people many called loyal minister.
sentences.idiomatic: Kill people many called loyal minister.

sentences.chinese: 二世曰：「若此則可謂能督責矣。」
sentences.literal: Second Emperor said: 'Like this then can call able supervise responsibility.'
sentences.idiomatic: Second Emperor said: 'Like this then can call able supervise responsibility.'

sentences.chinese: 初，趙高為郎中令，所殺及報私怨眾多，恐大臣入朝奏事毀惡之，乃說二世曰：「天子所以貴者，但以聞聲，群臣莫得見其面，故號曰『朕』。
sentences.literal: Initially, Zhao Gao as langzhong commander, what killed and repaid private enmity many, feared ministers enter court memorial affairs slander hate him, then persuaded Second Emperor said: 'Emperor what noble, only with hear sound, ministers none get see face, thus number 'Zhen'.
sentences.idiomatic: Initially, Zhao Gao as langzhong commander, what killed and repaid private enmity many, feared ministers enter court memorial affairs slander hate him, then persuaded Second Emperor said: 'Emperor what noble, only with hear sound, ministers none get see face, thus number 'Zhen'.

sentences.chinese: 且陛下富於春秋，未必盡通諸事，今坐朝廷，譴舉有不當者，則見短於大臣，非所以示神明於天下也。
sentences.literal: Moreover Your Majesty rich in youth, not must all understand various affairs, now sit court, dispatch raise have improper, then seen short by ministers, not what show divine clear to world.
sentences.idiomatic: Moreover Your Majesty rich in youth, not must all understand various affairs, now sit court, dispatch raise have improper, then seen short by ministers, not what show divine clear to world.

sentences.chinese: 且陛下深拱禁中，與臣及侍中習法者待事，事來有以揆之。
sentences.literal: Moreover Your Majesty deep bow forbidden middle, with minister and serving middle practice law wait affairs, affairs come have to measure.
sentences.idiomatic: Moreover Your Majesty deep bow forbidden middle, with minister and serving middle practice law wait affairs, affairs come have to measure.

sentences.chinese: 如此則大臣不敢奏疑事，天下稱聖主矣。」
sentences.literal: Like this then ministers dare not memorial doubtful affairs, world praise sage lord.'
sentences.idiomatic: Like this then ministers dare not memorial doubtful affairs, world praise sage lord.'

sentences.chinese: 二世用其計，乃不坐朝廷見大臣，居禁中。
sentences.literal: Second Emperor used his plan, then not sit court see ministers, dwell forbidden middle.
sentences.idiomatic: Second Emperor used his plan, then not sit court see ministers, dwell forbidden middle.

sentences.chinese: 趙高常侍中用事，事皆決於趙高。
sentences.literal: Zhao Gao constantly serve middle manage affairs, affairs all decided by Zhao Gao.
sentences.idiomatic: Zhao Gao constantly serve middle manage affairs, affairs all decided by Zhao Gao.

sentences.chinese: 高聞李斯以為言，乃見丞相曰：「關東群盜多，今上急益發繇治阿房宮，聚狗馬無用之物。
sentences.literal: Gao heard Li Si with speak, then saw chancellor said: 'Pass east crowd bandits many, now above urgent increase send corvee treat Epang palace, gather dogs horses useless things.
sentences.idiomatic: Gao heard Li Si with speak, then saw chancellor said: 'Pass east crowd bandits many, now above urgent increase send corvee treat Epang palace, gather dogs horses useless things.

sentences.chinese: 臣欲諫，為位賤。
sentences.literal: Minister wish admonish, position base.
sentences.idiomatic: Minister wish admonish, position base.

sentences.chinese: 此真君侯之事，君何不諫？」
sentences.literal: This true lord marquis affair, lord why not admonish?'
sentences.idiomatic: This true lord marquis affair, lord why not admonish?'

sentences.chinese: 李斯曰：「固也，吾欲言之久矣。
sentences.literal: Li Si said: 'Certainly, I wish speak long.
sentences.idiomatic: Li Si said: 'Certainly, I wish speak long.

sentences.chinese: 今時上不坐朝廷，上居深宮，吾有所言者，不可傳也，欲見無閒。」
sentences.literal: Now time above not sit court, above dwell deep palace, I have speak, cannot transmit, wish see no interval.'
sentences.idiomatic: Now time above not sit court, above dwell deep palace, I have speak, cannot transmit, wish see no interval.'

sentences.chinese: 趙高謂曰：「君誠能諫，請為君候上閒語君。」
sentences.literal: Zhao Gao told: 'Lord truly can admonish, please for lord wait above leisure speak lord.'
sentences.idiomatic: Zhao Gao told: 'Lord truly can admonish, please for lord wait above leisure speak lord.'

sentences.chinese: 於是趙高待二世方燕樂，婦女居前，使人告丞相：「上方閒，可奏事。」
sentences.literal: Thus Zhao Gao waited Second Emperor just feast pleasure, women dwell front, made person tell chancellor: 'Above just leisure, can memorial affairs.'
sentences.idiomatic: Thus Zhao Gao waited Second Emperor just feast pleasure, women dwell front, made person tell chancellor: 'Above just leisure, can memorial affairs.'

sentences.chinese: 丞相至宮門上謁，如此者三。
sentences.literal: Chancellor to palace gate above audience, like this three times.
sentences.idiomatic: Chancellor to palace gate above audience, like this three times.
